content: The Snake Sheriff's Spirit allows you to take the form of the tiger and roar into the battlefield, shaking and dealing damage to any nearby enemies. This attack does a moderate amount of damage but has a double-edged sword effect, making it suitable for only some styles. The effect boosts your Attack a little bit while massively reducing your Defense. This exchange won't be worth it for all ers.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snake_Sheriff_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Snake Sheriff Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Snake Sheriff Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
The Snake Sheriff's Spirit allows you to take the form of the tiger and roar into the battlefield, shaking and dealing damage to any nearby enemies. This attack does a moderate amount of damage but has a double-edged sword effect, making it suitable for only some styles. The effect boosts your Attack a little bit while massively reducing your Defense. This exchange won't be worth it for all ers.
